snippet: Isner was upset in the first round of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I., by Rajeev Ram.
abstract: Top seed John Isner loses to Rajeev Ram in first round at Hall of Fame Tennis Championships; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Isner was upset in the first round of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I., by Rajeev Ram.

headline.main: Top Seed John Isner Falls Early in Newport
